quote: There's no benchmark for how life's ""supposed"" to happen. There is no ideal world for you to wait around for. The world is always just what it is now, it's up to you how you respond to it.
quote_letters: THERES NO BENCHMARK FOR HOW LIFES SUPPOSED TO HAPPEN THERE IS NO IDEAL WORLD FOR YOU TO WAIT AROUND FOR THE WORLD IS ALWAYS JUST WHAT IT IS NOW ITS UP TO YOU HOW YOU RESPOND TO IT
